name: Ironclad Kestrel
description: Kestrel is a hulking figure with reinforced arms and legs. Their armored limbs are grafted onto their body like metal vines, covered in intricate circuits that glow faintly under neon lights. A single, crimson eye stares out from beneath a cowl.

personality.voice: Deep and metallic with a hint of distortion.
personality.agenda: Protecting their clientele from corporate espionage while profiting off the sale of cybernetic enhancements.
personality.background: Kestrel was once a street brawler, augmented by black market upgrades. After being betrayed by a rival gang, they swore to only serve those who could pay well and stay out of trouble.

flavor.rationale: Kestrel is here to sell experimental cybernetic upgrades and modifications, catering mainly to those who value physical strength over hacking prowess.
